title: iOS Software Engineer (L4) - Streaming and Discovery Experiences
overview: The iOS Software Engineer (L4) - Streaming and Discovery Experiences position is responsible for improving the Netflix experience by building engaging and cinematic iOS apps, implementing streaming algorithms, and creating UI frameworks for an efficient and enjoyable UI development process.
description:
Netflix is the world's leading streaming video service with over 200 million paid memberships in 190+ countries. The Consumer Engineering team builds the industry-leading Netflix iOS, Android, and TV apps.
